author: jorge.ici
title: Cardano & Mental Health
description: A depressão é um problema de saúde pública. A perda de produtividade, devido à ansiedade e à depressão, custa à economia global 1 trilhão de dólares anuais.

f6_assessments.q0:
The solution is not pointing to the relevant problem raised in the proposal (mental public health). In the end, the solution consists of publishing papers/articles about Family Constellation, when 
As a suggestion for improvement, I think that either the problem should be reconsidered to such solution in this proposal, or the solution should address the problem of mental public health with products that go beyond the production of 12 papers.
f6_assessments.q1:
The plan is unlikely to be implemented, as the proposal is not well built. There's a mismatch between the problem and the solution, and there's a mismatch between the real outcomes of the proposal and what it actually does. 

Another point: even the proposers raise questions about the feasibility of their own project: "We understand that for the writing of a scientific article, 12 weeks may seem unfeasible (and qualitatively dubious".
And they have mentioned that they are keen to publish their studies in ANY other journal that demonstrates interest if no relevant journal wants to publish the papers, invalidating the argument that quality in their research with mental health is a priority.
f6_assessments.q2:
The process of writing papers (which are the product of the proposal) is well described, but the papers are based on studies which the proposers do not clarify if they were made previously, nor their participation in such studies. The proposal lacks clarification in this aspect. To proceed with such studies, years of research would be needed.
Moreover, the proposers are describing as if the papers are following scientific principles, when they are being reviewed by colleagues (instead of being published in indexed journals with a blind-review process by the scientific community)

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is about article production. The problem (of Depression as a public health global problem) is clearly described and explained in detail. The solution is clearly defined [with an extended plan for article production (A1-A8), and a weekly plan]. This fits the challenge of Miscellaneous with a clear convincing expected impact to the Cardano ecosystem in short term and long term (with five more publications to publish in the future).
Therefore, based on the given information, I agree with this proposal's impact, I can rate it with a score of 4

solution: Cardano pode ser um catalisador para novas psicoterapias, como as Constelações Familiares (FC). Nossos artigos mostram a eficácia da FC na depressão.
experience: Trabalhamos com a CF desde 2001, desenvolvemos quatro protocolos técnico-científicos para a CF, e cooperamos na resolução de um caso judicial utilizando a CF.
